channel.title: Documentation on CtrlAltDelete.nu

item.title: Concerning idea debt and investment
item.description: I read this article about idea debt. Not sure which affected me the most. What she stated about idea investment, or the fact that she too doesn’t know how to use the french subjunctive correctly. Nonetheless, I’m truly inspired to put my old ideas to the side and work with what I’ve got at the moment. I want to start documenting stuff properly. This is my blog. My life.
